title: El Palacio de Hierro script logo
content:
Hi! I would greatly appreciate your knowledge as to this font or any look-alikes. Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140627132040im_/http:/typophile.com/files/elpalacio_4611.gif)
author: teplotaxl

comments.content: I'm not sure what this is, but you might like [Burgues Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20140627132040/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000267#specimen) by Alejandro Paul of Sudtipos
